summary: A spell that can control anything in game, including npcs.
descriptionHtml:
This illusion spell allows you to control a npc for 60secs, the target will defend for you against enemies automatically, and will do you a favor like a follower can do, including waiting, using objects, and even any kind crimes, making it especially fun to cast in the town and command him to attack others.
  
  Installation:
    zip out all the files including the scripts,put them under data folder,when loading ,wait a few secs, the spell should be added.
  
  v1.1:temporary change the target\'s faction to player werewolf faction, and now if you are not witnessed commanding crimes,the target will become the criminal himself and not adding any crime golds to you.
 
   known issues:
  Target will never commit crime against his own kins
  
  The effect maybe over after 60secs,yet the enimity between your target and his victims may not be over properly, and if there is anyone essential involved, the battle will last ages, leave out and wait,or use the calm spell will end it.
  
  To Non-human creatures(except deadra and daugr,they are counted as npcs), command will not work properly, but a kind of vanilla control effect works instead.
  
  If witness any crime you command,the crime will be add to you,make sure you hide well when you want the target to do anything wrong.
  
  Be prepared to take the target\'s anger, had you command him to do anything wrong after the effect ends.
author: jay0246 from 3dm
